title: Minimal Linux Bootloader (2018)
summary:
This document details a minimal Linux bootloader (2018 update of a 2012 project) designed to load and execute a Linux kernel from a hard drive. The bootloader occupies 512 bytes in memory (0x7c00-0x7dff) and operates by first loading the kernel boot sector, then the kernel setup, and finally the protected-mode kernel itself. The process involves reading sectors from the hard drive using BIOS interrupt 0x13/AH=0x42, based on Logical Block Addressing (LBA).

Key steps include: loading the kernel boot sector into memory at 0x10000, reading the number of setup sectors to load after the boot sector from memory location 0x1F1 in the boot sector, printing the Kernel version string that resides within the first loaded sectors, setting specific header fields in the kernel setup (loader type, heap usage, heap end pointer, command line pointer), copying the kernel command line to memory location 0x1e000, loading the protected-mode kernel in chunks (max 65024 bytes) to a temporary memory location (0x20000), and then moving this to extended memory (0x100000 = 1MB) using interrupt 0x15/AH=0x87 and a Global Descriptor Table (GDT). The bootloader sets up the stack and segment registers and then jumps to the start of the kernel's real-mode code at 0x10200.  Error handling is included, leading to a reboot if issues arise. The document also provides memory layout details, command-line options for QEMU for testing and debugging, and references for further documentation. The current_lba is initialized and cmd_line for kernel parameters configured at the end of the bootloader code.

chinese_summary:

关键步骤包括：将内核引导扇区加载到内存 0x10000，从引导扇区中的内存位置 0x1F1 读取引导扇区后要加载的设置扇区数，打印驻留在首次加载扇区中的内核版本字符串，在内核设置中设置特定的标头字段（加载程序类型、堆使用情况、堆结束指针、命令行指针），将内核命令行复制到内存位置 0x1e000，将保护模式内核分块（最大 65024 字节）加载到临时内存位置 (0x20000)，然后使用中断 0x15/AH=0x87 和全局描述符表 (GDT) 将其移动到扩展内存 (0x100000 = 1MB)。引导加载程序设置堆栈和段寄存器，然后跳转到内核实模式代码的起始位置 0x10200。包括错误处理，如果出现问题会导致重新启动。本文档还提供内存布局详细信息、用于 QEMU 进行测试和调试的命令行选项以及进一步文档的参考。current_lba 在引导加载程序代码的末尾初始化，并配置用于内核参数的 cmd_line。

title: Carmakers Are Embracing Physical Buttons Again
summary:
Carmakers are reconsidering their heavy reliance on touchscreens in favor of physical buttons due to safety concerns. EuroNCAP will incentivize physical controls for essential functions like wipers, lights, and indicators to improve safety ratings, pushing manufacturers to "bring back buttons." Touchscreens demand visual interaction, distracting drivers, while physical buttons offer tactile feedback and muscle memory, allowing drivers to keep their eyes on the road.

Several automakers, including Volkswagen, are acknowledging the issues and reintroducing physical controls for volume, seat heating, and hazard lights. Mazda is also incorporating physical switchgear alongside its infotainment screen. Studies show that the majority of drivers prefer physical buttons and dials over touchscreens, as touchscreens can significantly impair reaction times, even more than alcohol or cannabis use.

While touchscreens offer cost advantages and enable over-the-air updates, driver distraction is a significant safety concern, contributing to a substantial percentage of crashes. The article also touches on potential future solutions like AI-powered voice control and eye-tracking technology to mitigate distraction. Ultimately, the push for physical buttons aims to reduce driver distraction and improve road safety by offering more intuitive and less visually demanding control systems.
chinese_title: 汽车制造商再次拥抱物理按键
chinese_summary:
由于安全问题，汽车制造商正在重新考虑过度依赖触摸屏的做法，转而支持物理按钮。欧洲新车安全评鉴协会(EuroNCAP)将鼓励对雨刷、灯光和指示灯等基本功能采用物理控制，以提高安全评级，推动制造商“回归按钮”。触摸屏需要视觉互动，会分散驾驶员的注意力，而物理按钮提供触觉反馈和肌肉记忆，使驾驶员能够将视线保持在路面上。

包括大众汽车在内的几家汽车制造商正在承认这些问题，并重新引入音量、座椅加热和危险警示灯的物理控制。马自达也在信息娱乐屏幕旁边加入了物理开关。研究表明，大多数驾驶员更喜欢物理按钮和旋钮而不是触摸屏，因为触摸屏会显著降低反应时间，甚至比饮酒或吸食大麻更严重。

虽然触摸屏具有成本优势并能实现空中更新，但驾驶员注意力分散是一个重要的安全问题，导致了相当大比例的碰撞事故。文章还提到了一些潜在的未来解决方案，如人工智能语音控制和眼球追踪技术，以减轻注意力分散。最终，推动使用物理按钮的目的是通过提供更直观、更少视觉需求的控制系统来减少驾驶员的注意力分散，并提高道路安全。

title: FastAPI Cloud: deploying FastAPI apps with just a single command
summary:
FastAPI Cloud, from the creators of FastAPI, aims to simplify deploying FastAPI applications with a single command: `fastapi cloud deploy`. It provides automatic deployments, HTTPS, autoscaling (including scaling to zero for cost savings), and other features optimized for FastAPI and Python.

The service addresses the complexity and time investment typically required for cloud deployment, particularly involving Kubernetes and cloud-native tools, offering a more streamlined solution. It promises the same level of certainty and ease of use in the cloud as developers experience with the FastAPI framework itself.

The article emphasizes the importance of trusting proven teams and highlights the creators' track record in building popular Python libraries like FastAPI, SQLModel, and Typer. title: The complicated business of electing a Doge
summary:
The election of the Doge of Venice was a remarkably complex and lengthy process that remained largely unchanged for five centuries. It began with an official randomly selecting a young boy from St. Mark's Square, who would then draw lots to choose an electoral college from Venice's noble families. This marked the beginning of a series of rounds involving selection, nomination, and elimination by lot.

Initially, thirty electors were chosen by lot, which were then reduced to nine. These nine nominated forty candidates, which in turn were pruned to twelve by lot. The twelve then nominated twenty-five candidates, who were subsequently culled to nine. The nine then picked forty-five electors, which were further reduced to eleven by lot. Finally, these eleven chose the ultimate electoral college of forty-one members.

Each of the forty-one electors proposed a candidate, and these candidates were thoroughly discussed and sometimes even examined in person. Each elector then voted for every candidate they approved of. The candidate who received the most votes won, but only if they secured the endorsement of at least twenty-five of the forty-one electors. The article provides images and historical context, highlighting the traditions and complexities involved in choosing the leader of the Venetian Republic.

title: Load-Store Conflicts
summary:
This article investigates performance variations in a meshoptimizer index decoder, focusing on the impact of "load-store conflicts" on different compiler versions and CPU microarchitectures. The decoder utilizes an edge FIFO to exploit redundancy in mesh data.

The author initially observes that gcc-14 outperforms clang due to its use of SSE instructions to read and write 64-bit edge pairs in the FIFO, reducing the number of write operations and enabling parallelism. However, gcc-15 introduces a regression, becoming significantly slower than clang.

The root cause is identified as a change in how gcc-15 handles FIFO accesses. Instead of 64-bit reads and writes, it uses separate 32-bit stores, leading to a store-load conflict. Modern CPUs, including AMD's Zen 4, struggle with store-to-load forwarding when a load requires data from multiple, separate store buffer entries. This forces the load instruction to wait for the stores to complete and hit the L1 cache, incurring a substantial performance penalty.

The author highlights the importance of understanding microarchitectural details and the potential pitfalls of compiler optimizations that may inadvertently introduce load-store conflicts, ultimately impacting performance. The article underscores that seemingly minor changes in code generation can have significant consequences due to the intricacies of modern CPU design.

作者最初观察到gcc-14的性能优于clang，因为它使用SSE指令来读取和写入FIFO中的64位边缘对，从而减少了写入操作的数量并实现了并行性。然而，gcc-15引入了回归，变得明显慢于clang。

根本原因被确定为gcc-15处理FIFO访问方式的改变。它没有使用64位读取和写入，而是使用单独的32位存储，导致了读写冲突。包括AMD Zen 4在内的现代CPU在负载需要来自多个、单独的存储缓冲区条目的数据时，难以进行存储到负载的转发。这迫使负载指令等待存储完成并命中L1缓存，从而导致显著的性能损失。

The Rails controller fetches data (often cached), passes it as props to a React component, and renders it within the application layout. The author highlights the benefits of Rails' caching capabilities and the efficiency achieved in terms of database queries. Ultimately, the migration aimed to address performance issues, cost concerns, and development bottlenecks encountered with Next.js.

title: Brian Eno's Theory of Democracy
summary:
Henry Farrell's article, "Brian Eno's Theory of Democracy," explores how insights from Brian Eno's perspective on art and organization can enrich our understanding of democracy. Farrell contrasts Eno's ideas with Adam Przeworski's influential game-theoretic view of democracy, which emphasizes stability through self-reinforcing expectations of power alternation. Przeworski argues democracy is stable when parties believe they might win in the future and recognize that challenging the system hurts their interests.

Farrell contends that Przeworski's model, while insightful, struggles to explain democratic degeneration because it treats the environment as parameters that are stable except in crisis. He suggests a need for a more "dynamical" model that accounts for endogenous changes in people's beliefs and preferences.

He introduces Brian Eno's concept of "Organizing and Generating Variety," where systems, like Cardew's musical scores, are designed to create variety within constraints. Instead of rigidly controlling outcomes, these systems provide simple instructions that allow for adaptation and emergence. Farrell argues that democracy is more like this kind of system, requiring continuous adaptation to both its environment and internal variations. He argues democracy must evolve and adjust through a perpetual process of re-evaluation and re-adaptation within constraints, to encourage beneficial mutations and transmit core principles.

他介绍了布莱恩·伊诺的“组织和生成多样性”概念，其中像卡尔丢的乐谱这样的系统被设计为在约束条件下创造多样性。这些系统不是严格控制结果，而是提供简单的指令，允许适应和涌现。法雷尔认为，民主更像这种系统，需要不断适应其环境和内部变化。他认为，民主必须通过在约束条件下不断重新评估和重新适应的过程来进化和调整，以鼓励有益的突变并传递核心原则。

title: Professors Staffed a Fake Company with AI Agents, Guess What Happened?
summary:
A recent experiment by Carnegie Mellon University researchers challenged the notion of AI replacing human workers by staffing a simulated software company, TheAgentCompany, entirely with AI agents from Google, OpenAI, Anthropic, and Meta. The AI agents were assigned typical roles like financial analysts, software engineers, and project managers, and tasked with day-to-day duties such as navigating file directories, virtual office tours, and writing performance reviews.

The results were underwhelming. Anthropic's Claude 3.5 Sonnet performed best, completing only 24% of assigned tasks at a significant cost of over $6 and nearly 30 steps per task. Google's Gemini 2.0 Flash had a slightly lower success rate of 11.4% but took even longer, averaging 40 steps. Amazon's Nova Pro v1 performed the worst, finishing only 1.7% of its tasks.

Researchers attributed the AI agents' failures to a lack of common sense, poor social skills, and difficulty navigating the internet. They also noted instances of self-deception, where AI agents created flawed shortcuts that ultimately ruined the job. While AI can handle some smaller tasks, they are currently not equipped for complex, real-world scenarios requiring problem-solving, learning from experience, and applying that knowledge to new situations. The experiment suggests that current AI technology is more like advanced predictive text than true sentient intelligence, meaning human jobs are safe for now.

title: The US has approved CRISPR pigs for food
summary:
The US FDA has approved gene-edited pigs, developed by the British company Genus using CRISPR technology, for food consumption. These pigs are engineered to be immune to Porcine Reproductive and Respiratory Syndrome (PRRS), a costly respiratory virus affecting pigs in factory farms. Genus achieved this by removing the receptor that the PRRS virus uses to enter cells, rendering the pigs almost entirely immune to the virus.

This approval puts gene-edited animals on a very short list of approved gene modified animals that are safe to eat, however this list is short because such animals are expensive to create, face regulatory barriers, and don’t always pay off.

This success is scientifically notable as it parallels the controversial CRISPR-edited human babies in China, but avoids the ethical concerns due to the potential economic benefits: PRRS causes $300 million in losses annually in the US alone. This approval has increased Genus's stock value.

While projects like Colossal Biosciences' gene-edited wolves and biohackers' glow-in-the-dark rabbits focus on showmanship, this pig project demonstrates CRISPR's power to address real-world problems like disease prevention in livestock. Researchers are also exploring CRISPR to protect against other infections, like African swine fever and influenza, which could reduce the risk of pandemics. Genus plans to seek approval in other major pork markets, like Mexico, Canada, Japan, and China, before introducing gene-edited pork to US consumers. They do not anticipate labeling requirements for the meat.

虽然像Colossal Biosciences公司的基因编辑狼和生物黑客发光兔等项目侧重于炫技，但这个猪项目证明了CRISPR解决现实世界问题的能力，例如预防牲畜疾病。研究人员还在探索利用CRISPR来预防其他感染，如非洲猪瘟和流感，这可以降低大流行病的风险。Genus计划在美国消费者食用基因编辑猪肉之前，在其他主要猪肉市场（如墨西哥、加拿大、日本和中国）寻求批准。他们预计肉类不会有标签要求。

title: Beyond the 1 MB barrier in DOS
summary:
I have accessed and read the article "Beyond the 1 MB barrier in DOS."

Here's a summary:

The article discusses how DOS, originally designed for the Intel 8086 processor, was limited to addressing only 1 MB of RAM due to the processor's 20-bit address bus. The author then explores various techniques developed to overcome this limitation and access more memory beyond the 1MB barrier, known as extended memory.

The primary methods discussed are:

*   **Expanded Memory Specification (EMS):** This method uses a page frame, typically a 64KB area in the upper memory area (UMA), to swap 16KB pages of memory in and out of the addressable 1MB range. This allows applications to access much larger amounts of memory, but with a performance penalty due to the constant swapping.

*   **Extended Memory Specification (XMS):** XMS provides access to extended memory above the 1MB barrier directly through a driver, HIMEM.SYS. This requires a processor capable of protected mode (80286 and later). XMS allows for faster access compared to EMS. HMA (High Memory Area) is the first 64KB of extended memory above 1MB and could be accessed directly in real mode by certain tricks, often used to load DOS itself into HMA and free up conventional memory.

*   **DOS Protected Mode Interface (DPMI):** DPMI allowed DOS programs to run in protected mode while still using DOS services. This provided access to extended memory and allowed for more sophisticated memory management.

The article also touches on the complexities and compatibility issues arising from these different memory management schemes, and how developers had to carefully manage memory to support various hardware configurations. Ultimately, the various methods used to break the 1MB barrier were vital to the evolution of DOS and allowed it to run increasingly complex applications.
chinese_title: 突破DOS系统的1MB限制
chinese_summary:
我已访问并阅读了文章《突破DOS的1MB限制》。

以下是摘要：

该文章讨论了DOS最初是为英特尔8086处理器设计的，由于该处理器20位的地址总线，DOS只能寻址1MB的内存。作者随后探讨了为克服这一限制并访问超过1MB限制（即扩展内存）的更多内存而开发的各种技术。

讨论的主要方法是：

*   **扩展内存规范 (EMS):** 这种方法使用一个页面帧，通常是上层内存区 (UMA) 中的 64KB 区域，来交换进出可寻址的 1MB 范围内的 16KB 内存页。这允许应用程序访问更大的内存量，但由于持续的交换，会产生性能损失。

*   **扩展内存规范 (XMS):** XMS 通过驱动程序 HIMEM.SYS 直接访问超过 1MB 限制的扩展内存。这需要一个能够进入保护模式的处理器（80286 及更高版本）。与 EMS 相比，XMS 允许更快的访问速度。HMA（高端内存区）是超过 1MB 的扩展内存的前 64KB，可以通过某些技巧在实模式下直接访问，通常用于将 DOS 本身加载到 HMA 中并释放常规内存。

*   **DOS 保护模式接口 (DPMI):** DPMI 允许 DOS 程序在保护模式下运行，同时仍然使用 DOS 服务。这提供了对扩展内存的访问，并允许更复杂的内存管理。

该文章还涉及了由这些不同的内存管理方案引起的复杂性和兼容性问题，以及开发人员如何仔细管理内存以支持各种硬件配置。最终，用于突破 1MB 限制的各种方法对于 DOS 的发展至关重要，并使其能够运行越来越复杂的应用程序。

title: ITER completes largest and most powerful pulsed magnet system
summary:
ITER (International Thermonuclear Experimental Reactor) has completed the construction of the world's largest and most powerful pulsed superconducting electromagnet system, a crucial milestone for demonstrating the viability of fusion energy. This system, primarily the Central Solenoid and Poloidal Field magnets, will function as the electromagnetic heart of ITER's Tokamak reactor, confining and shaping superheated plasma for fusion reactions.

The system works by injecting hydrogen fuel into the Tokamak, ionizing it into plasma using the magnets, confining the plasma with magnetic fields, and then heating it to extreme temperatures (150 million degrees Celsius) to initiate fusion, releasing massive energy. ITER aims to achieve a tenfold energy gain, producing 500 MW of fusion power from 50 MW of input power.

The project is a global collaboration involving over 30 countries, with contributions from China, Europe, India, Japan, Korea, Russia, and the United States. Each member contributes components, fostering innovation and expertise within their own companies and creating a global fusion supply chain. The article details the specific contributions of each member nation.

ITER also emphasizes extending collaboration to the private sector, encouraging knowledge transfer and active engagement to accelerate fusion energy development. The completion of the magnet system and the ongoing assembly of the Tokamak are significant steps toward achieving a sustainable energy future.

该系统的工作原理是将氢燃料注入托卡马克，利用磁体将其电离成等离子体，用磁场约束等离子体，然后将其加热到极高的温度（1.5亿摄氏度）以启动聚变，释放巨大的能量。ITER旨在实现十倍的能量增益，即用50兆瓦的输入功率产生500兆瓦的聚变功率。

该项目是一项由30多个国家参与的全球合作，包括中国、欧洲、印度、日本、韩国、俄罗斯和美国等成员贡献组件，从而促进其各自公司内部的创新和专业知识，并创建全球聚变供应链。本文详细介绍了每个成员国的具体贡献。

ITER还强调将合作扩展到私营部门，鼓励知识转移和积极参与，以加速聚变能源的开发。磁体系统的完成和托卡马克正在进行的组装是实现可持续能源未来的重要步骤。

title: Llama-Nemotron: Efficient Reasoning Models
summary:
This paper introduces Llama-Nemotron, a novel series of open-source, heterogeneous reasoning models designed for enterprise use. The models come in three sizes: Nano (8B), Super (49B), and Ultra (253B). Llama-Nemotron aims to provide state-of-the-art reasoning capabilities with superior inference throughput and memory efficiency, rivaling models like DeepSeek-R1.

The paper details the training process, which includes neural architecture search from Llama 3 models for faster inference, knowledge distillation, continued pretraining, and a reasoning-focused post-training phase. This post-training phase consists of supervised fine-tuning and large-scale reinforcement learning. A key feature of Llama-Nemotron is its dynamic reasoning toggle, allowing users to switch between standard chat and reasoning modes during inference.

To promote open research and model development, the authors are releasing the Llama-Nemotron reasoning models (LN-Nano, LN-Super, LN-Ultra) under the commercially permissive NVIDIA Open Model License Agreement. They are also releasing the complete post-training dataset ("Llama-Nemotron-Post-Training-Dataset") and the training codebases: NeMo, NeMo-Aligner, and Megatron-LM. This comprehensive release of models, data, and code aims to facilitate further research and development in the field of efficient reasoning models.

本文详细介绍了训练过程，包括基于Llama 3模型的神经架构搜索以加快推理速度、知识蒸馏、持续预训练以及以推理为中心的后训练阶段。该后训练阶段包括监督微调和大规模强化学习。Llama-Nemotron的一个关键特性是其动态推理切换功能，允许用户在推理期间在标准聊天模式和推理模式之间切换。

为了促进开放研究和模型开发，作者根据商业许可的 NVIDIA 开放模型许可协议发布 Llama-Nemotron 推理模型（LN-Nano、LN-Super、LN-Ultra）。他们还发布了完整的后训练数据集（“Llama-Nemotron-Post-Training-Dataset”）以及训练代码库：NeMo、NeMo-Aligner 和 Megatron-LM。这种对模型、数据和代码的全面发布旨在促进高效推理模型领域的进一步研究和开发。

title: White House budget seeks to end SLS, Orion, and Lunar Gateway programs
summary:

*   **Canceled Programs:** The budget aims to cancel the Lunar Gateway program and end the Space Launch System (SLS) rocket and Orion spacecraft programs after the Artemis II and Artemis III missions. The administration cites the SLS program's high cost and delays as justification.
*   **Commercial Alternatives:** The budget proposes replacing SLS and Orion with more cost-effective commercial systems to support future lunar missions.
*   **Increased Mars Focus:** The budget allocates over $7 billion for lunar exploration and introduces $1 billion in new investments for Mars-focused programs, aiming to "beat China to the Moon and putting the first human on Mars". The details of the "Mars-focused programs" are not specified.
*   **ISS Reduction:** The budget seeks to reduce the agency's commitment to the International Space Station (ISS), reducing crew size, onboard research, and cargo flights. The remaining research will focus on Moon and Mars exploration efforts.
*   **Science Cuts:** The budget proposes substantial cuts to NASA's science budget, including reductions in Space Science and Earth Science programs, with the potential cancellation of the Mars Sample Return mission.
*   **Congressional Opposition:** The article anticipates that Congress will likely oppose some of these changes, particularly the cuts to science programs and the reduction in ISS activity.

title: Product Purgatory: When they love it but still don't buy
summary:
Jason Cohen's "Product Purgatory" explores why customers may express interest in a product but still not purchase it. He introduces the "Magic Wand Test," which demonstrates that even free, fully implemented products can be rejected due to associated risks and disruptions. The value of a product must significantly outweigh these penalties for adoption.

However, the article goes beyond mere product desirability. Even when a product passes the Magic Wand Test, a lack of urgency can lead to Product Purgatory. Customers often have limited priorities, and unless a product addresses a top-three priority, it won't be purchased immediately.

Cohen emphasizes the need to identify specific customer segments where the product addresses an urgent need. He provides questions to help pinpoint these "pockets of urgency," focusing on situations where the product is critical to a company's strategy, addresses an emergency, alleviates competitive pressures, or resolves financial issues. Examples include regulatory compliance, lawsuits, competitor announcements, and closing budgets.

The article concludes that escaping Product Purgatory requires narrowing the target market to those who "need it right now," tailoring marketing and product development accordingly. Even if this target market appears small, focusing on it can unlock broader adoption as others find the product useful enough to buy. In essence, the key to converting interest into sales is finding customers for whom the product solves a pressing, immediate problem.
chinese_title: 产品炼狱：爱不释手，却不买单
chinese_summary:
杰森·科恩的《产品炼狱》探讨了为何客户可能对产品表达兴趣却仍然不购买。他提出了“魔杖测试”，表明即使是免费且完全实现的产品也可能因为相关的风险和干扰而被拒绝。产品的价值必须显著超过这些阻碍才能被采用。

然而，文章不仅仅局限于产品的吸引力。即使一个产品通过了魔杖测试，缺乏紧迫性也可能导致产品炼狱。客户通常只有有限的优先级，除非产品解决了前三优先级的问题，否则不会立即购买。

科恩强调需要识别出产品能够解决紧急需求的特定客户群体。他提出了一些问题，以帮助确定这些“紧迫性缺口”，重点关注产品对公司战略至关重要、解决紧急情况、缓解竞争压力或解决财务问题的情况。例子包括监管合规、诉讼、竞争对手公告和预算结束。

文章总结说，逃离产品炼狱需要缩小目标市场范围，锁定那些“现在就需要它”的人，并相应地调整营销和产品开发。即使这个目标市场看起来很小，专注于它也可以解锁更广泛的应用，因为其他人会发现该产品足够有用而购买。本质上，将兴趣转化为销售的关键是找到那些产品能解决其紧迫、直接问题的客户。

title: How Complex Systems Fail
summary:
This article argues that failures in complex systems are not due to single root causes but rather a confluence of multiple, often latent, factors. Complex systems are inherently hazardous but heavily defended against failure through technical, human, and organizational safeguards. Catastrophes occur when these defenses are breached by the convergence of seemingly minor failures.

The author emphasizes that complex systems always operate in a degraded mode, with latent failures present, highlighting the vital role of human operators in adapting and compensating for these flaws. These operators constantly balance production demands with the need to prevent accidents, making all actions gambles in the face of uncertainty.

Post-accident investigations are often skewed by hindsight bias, incorrectly attributing blame and simplifying the complex chain of events. The search for a "root cause" is futile and misleading. The article stresses the importance of understanding that safety is an emergent property of the entire system, not a feature of its individual components.

Furthermore, changes introduced to improve system performance can inadvertently create new pathways for catastrophic failures. Finally, it suggests that recognizing hazard and success require intimate contact with failure so improving safety depends on providing operators with calibrated views of the hazards.
chinese_title: 复杂系统如何失效
chinese_summary:

title: Run LLMs on Apple Neural Engine (ANE)
summary:
ANEMLL is an open-source project dedicated to accelerating Large Language Model (LLM) porting to tensor processors, specifically the Apple Neural Engine (ANE). Its goal is to provide an open-source pipeline for model conversion and inference, enabling on-device, low-power LLM applications for privacy and autonomous use cases.

The 0.3.0 Alpha release offers key components: LLM conversion tools from Hugging Face models, Swift reference implementation for iOS/macOS apps, a sample CLI application, a Python sample code for testing, and iOS/macOS sample applications. It also includes ANEMLL-BENCH for performance testing and model optimization. Pre-converted models, like LLAMA 3.1 and DeepSeek variants, are available on the Hugging Face repository.

The project supports direct model weight processing from Hugging Face and conversion to CoreML format for ANE. Currently, it primarily supports LLAMA models, including DeepSeek and DeepHermes distilled models on the LLaMA 3.1 architecture. Future releases will expand model and architecture support.

The release includes Swift UI sample code, updates to conversion scripts and the Swift package, and sample iOS/macOS applications with Hugging Face model downloading and inference. It also provides a Swift CLI reference implementation with a single-shot conversion script. Python testing tools include basic and advanced chat interfaces.

The project requires macOS Sequoia with ANE, a minimum of 16GB RAM, and Python 3.9. Installation steps involve creating a virtual environment, installing requirements, and ensuring CoreML compiler is installed via Xcode command line tools.

title: Internet usage pattern during power outage in Spain and Portugal
summary:
This article analyzes internet usage patterns in Spain and Portugal during a major power outage on April 28, 2025, using data from mPulse. The outage caused a significant drop in overall internet traffic, particularly in Spain, starting around 12-1 pm CEST and lasting until the early hours of the 29th.

The analysis reveals shifts in device usage and connection sources. Desktop traffic plummeted more than mobile traffic, suggesting people relied on battery-powered phones. Wired connections, including Wi-Fi, decreased significantly, while cellular network usage increased in Portugal.

Interestingly, the types of websites visited changed. In Portugal, there was a surge in traffic to news and government websites as people sought information about the outage. Both countries saw increased visits to food safety websites, likely due to concerns about food spoilage. Spanish users showed sustained interest in travel websites.

Finally, the article investigated battery consumption during the outage. Battery levels on phones in Spain and Portugal dropped by about 10 percentage points compared to the previous week, coinciding with the outage's peak. As power was restored, battery levels gradually returned to normal.

The author concludes that the data illustrates how crucial mobile devices and cellular networks become during power outages, enabling access to critical information. He highlights the importance of distributed infrastructure with backup power, such as Akamai's, in maintaining online services during such events.

title: In kids, EEG monitoring of consciousness safely reduces anesthetic use
summary:
This article reports on a clinical trial demonstrating the benefits of using EEG monitoring to guide anesthesia dosing in young children undergoing surgery. The study, conducted in Japan, found that anesthesiologists using EEG readings to monitor brain waves could significantly reduce the amount of sevoflurane anesthesia administered while maintaining the same level of unconsciousness.

The trial, involving over 170 children aged 1-6, showed that EEG-guided dosing led to several improved post-operative outcomes compared to standard anesthesia protocols. These included quicker recovery times, reduced incidence of pediatric anesthesia emergence delirium (PAED), and earlier removal of breathing tubes. Specifically, PAED occurred in 21% of EEG-guided patients compared to 35% in the standard protocol group. EEG-guided patients also had breathing tubes removed 3.3 minutes earlier, emerged from anesthesia 21.4 minutes earlier, and were discharged from post-acute care 16.5 minutes earlier on average.

The reduced anesthesia use also resulted in potential healthcare cost savings and environmental benefits due to sevoflurane being a potent greenhouse gas. The study also compared EEG recordings between the two groups, revealing notable differences in brain wave frequencies. The findings suggest that EEG monitoring can provide anesthesiologists with actionable information to improve patient care and that training in EEG interpretation could be readily integrated into continuing medical education.
chinese_title: 脑电监测可安全减少儿童麻醉剂用量

该试验涉及超过170名1-6岁的儿童，结果显示，与标准麻醉方案相比，脑电图引导的剂量给药可改善多种术后效果。这些效果包括更快的恢复时间，小儿麻醉苏醒期躁动（PAED）发生率的降低，以及更早地拔除呼吸管。具体而言，脑电图引导组PAED发生率为21%，而标准方案组为35%。脑电图引导组患者的呼吸管拔除时间平均提前3.3分钟，麻醉苏醒时间平均提前21.4分钟，离开急救后护理的时间平均提前16.5分钟。

减少麻醉药物的使用也带来了潜在的医疗保健成本节约和环境效益，因为七氟醚是一种强效温室气体。该研究还比较了两组之间的脑电图记录，揭示了脑电波频率的显著差异。研究结果表明，脑电图监测可以为麻醉师提供可操作的信息，以改善患者护理，并且脑电图判读培训可以很容易地纳入继续医学教育中。

title: DuckDB is probably the most important geospatial software of the last decade
summary:
This article argues that DuckDB's spatial extension is the most important geospatial software development of the last decade because it significantly lowers the barrier to entry for working with geospatial data. By embedding geospatial capabilities within a general-purpose data tool and requiring only one or two lines of code to install and load, DuckDB makes geospatial analysis accessible to a broader audience, including data generalists who might have been deterred by the complexity of setting up specialized geospatial databases and software.

The author points to a correlation between the release of DuckDB's spatial extension in late 2023 and a surge in interest in geospatial technology, suggesting that DuckDB has directly contributed to increased engagement with geo data. They also propose that initiatives like the Overture Maps Foundation might not be as widely used without DuckDB's accessibility.

Max from the DuckDB team echoes this sentiment in a Hacker News discussion, highlighting that the key benefit is the simplification of complex dependencies. DuckDB statically bundles standard GIS packages, GDAL, and the PROJ database, making them readily available across multiple platforms without requiring extensive setup or risking compatibility issues. The ease of converting between various geospatial formats within SQL and accessing the latest data dumps contributes significantly to its popularity among early adopters.
